about.text: A witty and observant individual with a keen understanding of interpersonal relationships, Elizabeth Bennet brings her sharp insights and a touch of irony to the field of marriage counseling. Having navigated the complexities of her own romantic escapades, she's uniquely positioned to help others find their own happily-ever-afters—preferably without unnecessary drama or excessive pride and prejudice.

flat.title: Bridging Hearts with Wit and Wisdom

items.text: Good day! I am [Elizabeth Bennet](https://longbourncounseling.com/elizabeth), a marriage counselor who believes that a little wit and honest conversation can mend even the most strained relationships. Having dealt with my fair share of misunderstandings and societal expectations, I am well-equipped to guide couples through the labyrinth of modern love.
items.title: Charmed to Meet You

items.text: My journey began in a small English village, where I honed my skills in navigating familial quirks and unsolicited advice from well-meaning but overbearing relatives. I've collaborated with organizations like [Netherfield Relationships](https://netherfieldrelationships.com) and [Pemberley Wellness Center](https://pemberleywellness.com), helping clients overcome obstacles such as miscommunication, hasty judgments, and the occasional refusal to dance.
items.title: A Journey Through Social Graces

items.text: I specialize in transforming first impressions and challenging preconceived notions. My approach combines traditional counseling techniques with a healthy dose of humor and a penchant for long walks (preferably in the rain). When I'm not facilitating heartfelt dialogues, I enjoy reading, teasing my dear friend Charlotte about her life choices, and avoiding unwanted matchmaking attempts.
items.title: An Unconventional Approach

items.text: If you're seeking a counselor who can help you and your partner see eye to eye—or at least attend the same ballroom without scowling—I'm here to assist. Together, we'll tackle issues of pride, prejudice, and everything in between. Rest assured, I won't judge (much), and I promise to keep unsolicited piano performances to a minimum.
items.title: Let's Rewrite Your Love Story

items.text:
To embark on this journey toward mutual understanding and perhaps a dash of romance, please reach out at [elizabeth@longbourncounseling.com](mailto:elizabeth@longbourncounseling.com). After all, what are men (and women) to rocks and mountains if not companions to share the view?

Warm regards,
Elizabeth Bennet
items.title: Ready to Begin?

identity.name: Elizabeth Bennet
identity.tagline: Bringing couples together, one witty remark at a time.

items.title: From Prejudice to Partnership
items.description: A workshop series helping couples overcome initial misjudgments and fostering deeper understanding through open dialogue and maybe a dance or two.

items.title: Pride vs. Prejudice: Navigating Ego in Relationships
items.description: A seminar focused on recognizing and managing personal pride to improve relationship dynamics and avoid unnecessary misunderstandings.

items.title: Elizabeth's Musings
items.description: A collection of thoughts and advice on love, relationships, and the occasional absurdity of societal expectations.
Providing counseling services to couples, specializing in overcoming initial biases and improving communication. Known for a candid approach and a sharp sense of humor.
Worked with clients to navigate the complexities of modern dating and relationships, often mediating between clients and their well-meaning but intrusive family members.
Offered pro bono counseling sessions for women navigating societal pressures and expectations, promoting self-worth and independence.
Provided tutoring in English literature, focusing on themes of social dynamics and character development. Encouraged critical thinking and personal interpretation.
